tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am writing to share my experience about the Invisalign treatment I received from Dr. Srinivas. I must say that I am extremely satisfied with the treatment and the overall experience.

From the very first consultation, he took the time to explain the entire treatment process in detail, answered all my questions patiently and made sure I was comfortable with everything. He also discussed the expected outcomes and provided me with a clear idea of what to expect throughout the treatment.

 I could see a visible improvement in the alignment of my teeth within a few weeks. He monitored my progress regularly and made adjustments to the treatment plan as required to ensure that I achieved the desired results.

Thank you, Dr. Srinivas, for the excellent care and service.

Very friendly staff, highly knowledgeable staff and treating very well
I highly recommend 
Thank you so much Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi, My Name is Mamatha. I run an Fancy store and a boutique I am not able to speak and laugh while talking into the customers why because I have a lot of gaps in between the teeth so I consult the doctor first time he spoke to me very friendly and cleared my doubts before consulting this I tried and consult so many doctors no body gave promises to fill my gaps. Srinivas's Doctor told to me within one year your total gaps will fill by using the braces. After one year of removing the braces, I have no gaps in between my teeth I saw my face in the mirror I felt very surprised and I can't believe this much of changes have been done by using the braces I regularly visit the doctor and I am not neglecting the doctor appointment visit timings. Now I recommend and reference give  so many of my customers also very happy after consulting the doctor.
reply_text:
Thank you very much for taking your valuable time and writing an elaborate feedback Ms Mamatha. Your feedback fills us with joy and gives us energy to do even better.
Once again thank you for your references also.

review: Doctor analysed complete teeth and suggested the treatment. Explained in a very clear way.  Clinic was very hygenic too
Excellent experience! Very professional in bedside manner and explained every step of the way on what was being done and why.
**** **** ******* listened to the issue and explained clearly the issue and solutions! Would recommend for sure
